item.description:
We have had picnic potlucks at Roger Williams Park and Colt State Park previously. This summer, we are holding the Newcomers picnic potluck at Goddard State Memorial Park in Warwick. Check out the activities available at the park here: http://www.riparks.co...

We will be meeting for a late lunch at 1:30pm. I have a small grill to bring, but it might be good if someone could bring another. Also, I will be providing plates, cups, napkins, and plasticware.

Here are some ideas for things to bring for the picnic:


  • Hamburgers/hotdogs/veggie burgers + buns
  • Other meats to grill
  • Pre-made sandwiches or wraps
  • Chips
  • Salad (fruit, veggie, pasta, potato, etc.)
  • Water, soda, or juice
  • Artistan breads and cheeses
  • Desserts


Alcoholic beverages are not permitted at the park

We have reserved Picnic Sites 109, 110, 115, 116, and 117. You can see a map of the park here: http://www.riparks.co... - The parking lot closest to our site is the one located by picnic sites 74-76.

When RSVP-ing, please write what you plan on bringing so others may know. Any questions, please email me.
item.how_to_find_us: Picnic Sites 109, 110, 115, 116, and 117 - See park map below
item.name: Picnic Potluck at Goddard Memorial State Park
